title: Effects of different high pressure steaming processes on sensory properties, water-binding capacity, antioxidant and aroma compounds ofIpomoea batatas(L.) Lam.
abstract: High pressure steaming is a convenient and household cooking method to heat the food evenly and retain original nutrition. This study explored the effects of high pressure steaming processes on the sensory properties, nutritional value, phenolic compounds, water status, and volatile compounds of sweet potato "Xinxiang" and "Pushu32."
